Texts.Chs:
一种先进的机械体。

^orange;食性^reset;：机械食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:

^orange;增益^reset;:
能量值上限^green;+30^reset;%，移动速度^green;+5^reset;%，饥饿速度^green;-97^reset;%
抗性：物理抗性^green;+25^reset;%，寒冷抗性^green;+30^reset;%，毒素抗性^green;+50^reset;%，辐射抗性^green;+50^reset;%
免疫：寒冷，雪，冰，雪泥，中毒，窒息

^orange;环境^reset;:
炎热环境：能量回复速度^red;-50^reset;%
寒冷环境：能量回复速度^green;+25^reset;%

^orange;武器^reset;:
盾牌：完美格挡时增加能量

^red;弱点^reset;:
感电状态时：能量值上限^red;-50^reset;%
抗性：电系抗性^red;-100^reset;%
Texts.Eng:
Created by the Notix, the Trinks are a race of sentient robots who live in harmony with their creators. They value efficiency above all, and are responsible for many of the technological advancements of the Elithian Alliance.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Robotic

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  -^green;97^reset;% Hunger Drain
  Energy x^green;1.3^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Physical, +^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;50^reset;% Poison, Radiation
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Cold, Snow, Ice, Slush, Poison, Oxygen
  ^green;Eyelights^reset;: Permanent headlights

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Hot biomes: -^red;50^reset;% E. Regen
  Cold biomes: +^green;25^reset;% E. Regen

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Shield: Perfect Blocks increase Energy

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  -^red;50^reset;% Energy when Electrified
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;100^reset;% Electric
